title: Introduction to Anthropology Using Digital Resources: Customized Online Inquiry Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Students complete three weekly face-to-face sessions and four asynchronous online activities, focusing on digital tool-assisted data analysis and collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can understand anthropological research methodologies and classify cultural materials in digital archives
Learners can create comparative cultural analysis reports using online collaboration tools
Learners can interpret contemporary societal issues from an anthropological perspective and participate in discussion forums
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
